creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons, in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: White ground with purple and red stripes; discontinuous supplementary weft patterning in red, orange, blue, green, yellow, pink and purple; complex design consisting of three borders surrounding a central panel of patterning; outer band is a star and diamond motif, second border is composed of bird figures, inner border is geometric patterning; central panel holds rows of double-headed eagles alternating with rows of roosters, all set on a red a purple flecked ground.
title: Cloth (tzute)
